website_summaries.verdict: A simple, basic convertible car seat that comes with a few perks to make it easier to adjust and install.
pros: Front harness adjustment and buckle make it easy to fit the harness to the child
Lightweight and easy to install, making it a great choice for families who fly frequently
Compact design meant for smaller vehicles
cons: Lacks the luxurious looks of other models

customer_reviews.title: My daughter and my 2 year old were in horrible crash.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and my 2 year old were in horrible crash... the car flipped over, slide across the highway landing upside down! The car seat saved her life! Just some red marks from the straps!!! Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jim A.

customer_reviews.title: Contained my toddler octopus
customer_reviews.text: Saved our lives and the sanity of others on our spirit flight. Fit the small seats they have, easy to use/install and light! Must have to start and end a vacation with a tyrant...I mean toddler
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: highly rated by independent reviewing orgs
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of crap for buying such an, "affordable" carseat, but it turns out, this carseat is very highly rated by conusmer reports.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy this piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: Piece of crap! Spend the extra money and buy a quality car seat. We made the mistake of purchasing this as a backup car seat and it is the worst choice we could have made. Cushioning is very thin and unfortable, cannot get the car seat to latch down tight enough in the seat (2016 Toyota Tacoma) the release to loosen the straps is near impossible to get to when it is in rear facing position. I could go on. We are in the process of returning and buying a better quality car seat.
customer_reviews.author: Troy White

customer_reviews.title: Fabric is not the same as pictured!
customer_reviews.text: I expected the model in the picture. What we received matched in color and pattern, but did not have what looked to be a plusher type of velour throughout as pictured in the product photo. What we received was shiny nylon. If this seat was more expensive, it would be returned for this reason. The plush fabric was very appealing to me. You can ven see wrinkles in the fabric from the foam. Don't know what that's all about,
customer_reviews.author: GoodValueHunter

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work rear facing in Tahoe
customer_reviews.text: This car seat did NOT work rear facing in our Tahoe. We would have had to put something under the grant of the car seat in order for it to even be level. There's no recline at all. it was so poorly made that I'm wondering if I was shipped a product that was missing the reclining base. My car seat was also missing the lackluster cup holder. This will be returned. I don't recommend this product if you want a safe car seat for your little one.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for travel! Cars and planes!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our plane trip because the convertible car seats we have for our cars weigh 45 lbs... Could not be happier with the weight of it!! SO LIGHT!! Also, was very happy with the ease of putting in and taking it out of a car and airplane! the only thing you need to be aware of on a plane is that the buckle ends up behind the child's back, so you need a little pillow or folded blanket to pad it so they don't feel the buckle in their back. Perfect and a great price. Will use it for all travel in the future, and for an extra car seat for Grandma (did I mention it's sooo light?!)
customer_reviews.author: Cpo

customer_reviews.title: Torture to uninstall, terrible fabric - I do not recommend at all
customer_reviews.text: It was awful, awful to uninstall. I was on the pho e with the company for 20 minutes trying to get it unclipped and the rep says ...oh yeah, some don't have the clip release and it can b pretty tough to unlock. After about 40+ minutes of fighting with it I got it. And sent it right back. The fabric was also awful. I could not imagine it ever holding up let alone coming clean. It seemed very uncomfortable, maybe because the fabric was so thin. I know this was a less expensive car seat but still. I did get one even cheaper than this one and can uninstall it in minutes, it's cushy and cleanable fabric.
customer_reviews.author: kat gwinn 4podz

customer_reviews.title: Decent, not for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as an extra for air travel. On the biggest setting, there’s not a lot of crotch space for my child, who is small for his age. The buckle is hard for my parents to undo, and they are not newbies when it comes to car seats. Shoulder strap covers are a must, digs into little necks. No padding, so it’s not comfortable for anything but a short ride. I do feel it is a safe seat, so it serves its purpose in that way. It’s not a bells and whistles seat, so I knew going in that it wouldn’t be luxurious.
customer_reviews.author: Wilhelm

customer_reviews.title: Buy a different seat
customer_reviews.text: We did not like this carseat! I know that it's cheaper so I expected basic, no nice padding or fancy designs, no big deal. My issue was with the fact that the strap to secure it in my car didn't reach the seat clips and we could not get it tightened well enough with the cars seat belt. It was unsafe and we had to by another brand. So a cheap seat cost us a lot more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah C

customer_reviews.title: Baby hated this seat, unfortunately
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for plane travel, and unfortunately our 13 month old hated it. She couldn’t sleep in it because it was so upright (both forward facing in the plane and rear facing in the car), and she kept jolting awake. She also was miserable in it even when she wasn’t trying to sleep, and kept screaming in what seemed like discomfort (she is not a screamer) and fighting against the straps. We got home and she immediately passed out in her regular comfy car seat that has more recline to it. The pros are that it’s nice and lightweight, and at a good price point, but that’s about all the good I can say.
customer_reviews.author: Emily B Cabral

customer_reviews.title: A nice car seat
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as s a secondary car seat, as a grandma it is just to inconvenient to keep moving around a car seat from vehicle to vehicle, so I bought this one to just keep in my car. It sets up easy enough, my grand child rides well in it and I have no complaints. other than I didnt add the cupholder on, just personal preferrance. Its a good seat and measured up to my expectations of a safe car seat.
customer_reviews.author: stilljojo

customer_reviews.title: Thin but works.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say? It's simple, lightweight and easy to install and works. The safety harness fit in the middle row in the middle seat of my 2010 Toyota Sequoia however, after 20 minutes of working at our granddaughters other grandmother COULD NOT get it to work in her Honda SUV that is newer than ours. This was for rear facing. This is very thin. I sold this to buy a more padded one. If you need an extra that will not be used often you might like this. I personally just want more padding around a grandbaby.
customer_reviews.author: Gammie

customer_reviews.title: great car seat
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my wife who has been keeping our granddaughter and occasionally uses her car for traveling. Our daughter has this exact same car seat and it has been great at keeping our child safe and secure....Easy to install and easy to get the child into the seat quickly and effectively....and at the same time keeping her safe in the event of an accident. This is a good size seat and allows the child to grow into it, and not having to replace it with another one. I would recommend this product to anyone needing a dependable car seat for their little ones.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Lee

customer_reviews.title: Good for travel but wouldn't use as primary car seat
customer_reviews.text: Yes it is super lightweight for travel which is primarily why I bought it. With that being said, I don't feel it is as safe as our other car seats and it worries me when she is in this car seat. Since we have number 2 on the way, we needed another car seat for my husband's car so we have installed this car seat there. Her primary car seat is in my car and luckily I do most of the driving. To me, this car seat moves around too much no matter how much I tighten straps. My other car seats don't budge when strapped down. That is my concern.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqueline Alayon

customer_reviews.title: Purchased for our other car
customer_reviews.text: Purchased 2 of these one for our second car and the other for my mothers car. The reviews were great and the safety ratings were great, the price is also very budget friendly. The installation isn’t too difficult it - it’s similar to most convertible car seats it’s just a bit annoying to move the cloth cover to get the seat belt through. It’s very light so great for moving from one car to another, and we’ll probably use it for travel as well. Overall, so far, works great for our purposes.
customer_reviews.author: Carla

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed with Evenflo
customer_reviews.text: I bought this car seat for my car for my granddaughter. It came in the time promised. There was no user manual in the box, no biggie I could download from the manufacture website-but for a new product it should of been in there. Also not included was the cup holder. I had to contact the manufacturer for this, now I wait to see how long this takes. This was a deciding factor to purchase this car seat was having a cup holder.... I should of sent it back, but didn't want the hassle.
customer_reviews.author: observer

customer_reviews.title: Great for a travel car seat - not the best for long trips in the car
customer_reviews.text: I gave this product 5 stars because it has all the safety features and is SUPER light weight, which makes it a joy to fly with which is what I assume most people looking at this seat are thinking about. It’s a bit harder to install than other car seats but you get used to it. It also has almost no cushion which makes traveling in a car once you arrive to your destination safe, but not super comfortable for the kiddo. I’d probably buy this product again, given that flying with about 100 lbs of baby gear is a party in itself, but wish it had a tad more padding!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice seat
customer_reviews.text: Purchased the convertible because little one was getting too big for the rear-facing car seat that we had. Still too young/small to seat front-facing, so this one will be perfect for the transitional stage. Using the convertible recline feature is as simple as it gets. Harness is easy to adjust to fit. The seat is well-padded for a comfortable ride. Only complaint is that the cup hold on the outside of the seat is hard for little ones to reach. Once kiddo is a little bigger, he should be able to reach his cup. The cup holder can be attached to seat on either side so it doesn't get in the way.
customer_reviews.author: trisha

customer_reviews.title: Safety at a Fair Price
customer_reviews.text: This is a sturdy seat at an affordable price. The installation instructions were a little intimidating (20+ pages) and hard to locate because they were tucked under the side of the carseat. When I did not immediately find them, I downloaded them and printed a copy. It took me about an hour to correctly install the seat (facing the rear, towel rolled under it, etc.). The seat is for my 1-year-old grandson; after I finished the installation, including adjusting the straps to the correct height, my son told me that the fire dept. down the street would have installed it for me at no charge! 😂
customer_reviews.author: Melanie Lasseter

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to install rear facing.
customer_reviews.text: I was intrigued by the mostly positive reviews for such an affordable car seat. I received it and promptly installed in the car rear-facing but noticed it wasn’t quite leveled. Well, after a while of fiddling with it my husband and I both could not get the car seat to stay leveled without the use of a rolled up blanket or towel. My husband refuses to rely on such methods to ensure the safety of such an important child equipment so we returned it. Perhaps if our car backseat was shaped differently or if we were using it forward-facing, it would’ve been fine. On the upside, I liked how lightweight it was.
customer_reviews.author: Lailai

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this seat as our secondary (in father's car which she doesn't ride in often) and travel car seat. It's lightweight but sturdy. It fits in the airplane seat forward facing but it can be a pain/hassle to thread the seat belt properly because you have to partially remove the seat cover, especially when there are people waiting for you to sit down and be settled in your seat. The cover removes easily for cleaning and holds up well after washing. She seems pretty comfortable in it. We even recommended it to my sister when they were looking to purchase a travel car seat. Fits well on our car seat travel caddy to roll through the airport as well.
customer_reviews.author: Minh N

customer_reviews.title: I prefer Graco for everyday use but...
customer_reviews.text: I prefer Graco for everyday use but ordered this car seat to travel with. It is very light weight and narrowly fits down the center aisle of a 737 (just don't install the cup holder). It was a little too big to go on the conveyor bag check at the TSA security checkpoint but they were able to hand inspect it quickly and move us along.
customer_reviews.author: Your Favorite Texans

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for our second car seat.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived in its original box and was on time, this is a backup car seat for our second vehicle that doesn’t get used often, so we didn’t want to spend a ton on it, but still want safety to be the priority. It looks nice, I like the adjustable straps and does everything it’s supposed to. The main car seat I use has much more padding and seems to be more comfortable as well as more versatile, but I paid $300 for it, so that’s what I would expect at that price point. Overall it’s a well made, easy to use, quality car seat for the money.
customer_reviews.author: KH331

customer_reviews.title: After two years I still love it & will buy another for my next baby
customer_reviews.text: Shocked at how much I've liked it these last two years. The only slight issues I've had after my toddler using it for two years are that the fabric cover kinda pops off the armrest area fairly easily, and the buckles get tangled/twisted fairly easily now that they're so long to wrap around my two year old. But for the $100+ price difference between this one and the next highest rated one, I can deal with a couple of annoyances! It's also SO LIGHTWEIGHT! When I shopped for a car seat at the store this week, they were all monstrous and so heavy. Not interested. I'm buying another one of these for my other baby.
customer_reviews.author: C. Kindt

customer_reviews.title: Simple Carseat that does what it needs to
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice carseat for the price. I will say that the teather strap is not compatible with a double cab GMC Serria due to the hoops in the middle seat in rear being to far up making it too close to tighten. I think if you move it to the side position you may be okay. My little one wanted to sit in it while I was trying to install it....smh so she loves the seat....this will be our spare seat....
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: this is good for older children only
customer_reviews.text: i am only giving 1 star because I am so mad that the manufacturer said this product can be used for newborns starting from 5lbs, but this is deceptive since my newborn's head wobbles and cannot sit in a sitting position and it isn't possible to install in a more reclined position. Do not buy this for newborn, this is good for older children only.
customer_reviews.author: gameflow

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: I needed a car seat that was FAA approved for flying. I saw ones that were cheaper but wanted one with a bit more padding. My daughter loves this car seat and I feel comfortable having it in a car or airplane. It is simple to use but has all of the necessary features.
customer_reviews.author: wavrida

customer_reviews.title: Appears super uncomfortable and does not have much padding
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this car seat. It had so many great reviews, such a great price point, and super light. The reason I decided not to keep this is because the seat appears super uncomfortable and does not have much padding. It would be good for a family on a budget based on the reviews but I wanted something that my baby would enjoy sitting in and this is not it. To me it looked like it was made of primarily plastic with a thin covering. Plus the cup hold is not flexible and clips onto the side so it will most likely be easily damaged.
customer_reviews.author: S. Ngov

customer_reviews.title: It will do
customer_reviews.text: So far decent for the price. Down side is that the chest clip is difficult to snap together and difficult to open, it’s also not as plush as other more expensive seats. We kept it bc our son looked comfortable in it and it is simple in the sense that it doesn’t come with 1000 different accessories that need to be clipped on for different stages/ages etc. it literally is just a seat....
customer_reviews.author: Cindy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these seats as extras for my husband and babysitter's vehicles. No bells or whistles but does the job. Slightly more reclined than others I've seen but for the price and safety ratings, this a great buy. Easy to get my son in and out, no issues with the clips however the belts have gotten twisted a time or two, no biggie. Had a little trouble installing, the instructions weren't as detailed as I'd hoped for, for a first time mom. After a quick youtube tutorial, we got it installed with no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Chantelle

customer_reviews.title: HUGE PAIN TO SECURE SAFELY. BARELY RECLINES
customer_reviews.text: It's cheap price reflects it's quality. I would rather pay another $50 than use this carseat again. It is a pain in the butt to securely attach to the car, and has no padding. It BARELY reclines for smaller children. This is NOT good for a baby younger than 6 months but honestly it's just not good no matter what.
customer_reviews.author: B.

customer_reviews.title: You Get What You Pay For
customer_reviews.text: I needed a car=seat for our grandson while his parents cam for a one week visit. This product was significantly less expensive than most others. While it does the job., the materials are not the best, setup is not intuitive and the manual can be confusing. Worse, in set-up and adjusting, the sharp edges of the plastic leave scratches and welts. Quick to note that the sharp sections do not impact the toddler seating area.
customer_reviews.author: Stan K

customer_reviews.title: Not happy with this car seat
customer_reviews.text: The main selling point for me was the fact that this boasted as having a latch system; however the strap for the latch system is short & NOT expandable!!! As a result it is a struggle to get the latch hooked up & in our friend's honda it would not fit at all! Also the harness straps have no padding so it left marks on my child (not severe, but that was just during a normal car ride, I can't imagine what would happen in a crash). The only reason I am giving it 2 stars is that it is light weight; which is good for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. D

customer_reviews.title: Nice for air travel
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat for taking on flights. Super lightweight. I would not buy this as the main everyday car seat - not enough padding. It would be uncomfortable for long trips. The cup holder is junk and my toddler just pulls it off. Installation is okay with the seat belt but we struggled for a long time trying to get the hooks to clip to the car (the strap isn't long enough for a Toyota Camry or a Toyota 4Runner). A worthwhile purchase if you are taking the kiddo on a lot of planes - just get this car seat on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Good toddler car seat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat for this grandmas car. I have my 18 month old and growing grand baby (momma just started a job and need grandma help) and she has ample leg room and it fits good in my CRV... easy enough to get her in and out... with enough room for her 17 year old uncle to ride in back with her... loving it... her parents want to steal it!!
customer_reviews.author: jane next door

customer_reviews.title: Budget friendly car seat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased 2 of these car seats to have on hand for when our granddaughters visit from out of state so that my daughter doesn't have to check their high end car seats risking damage when they fly. These car seats fit the bill wonderfully. We have even loaned one to a friend for a niece who is visiting, now. So they are perfect of occasional use. I'm not how durable they would be for 365/yr use, but we are happy for what we are using them for.
customer_reviews.author: arlah

customer_reviews.title: Great travel and secondary car seat
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this car seat to travel between family members as they took turns babysitting my son. Grandparents, aunts and godparents. It was easy for them to carry and install. Especially my parents. We also would bring this car seat with us to travel by plane on vacations. We purchased our first one in 2017 and we are going to purchase another one to keep with his godmother.
customer_reviews.author: heavenly137

customer_reviews.title: Comfy.  Clean and Easy
customer_reviews.text: We actually got this for my mom to use in her car when our kid is over with her. It has really good padding inside and our 3 year old seems to be comfortable in it as noted by her tendency to fall asleep in the chair. Looks good and was not tough to install, unlike another model we have that you essentially have to have an engineering degree on!
customer_reviews.author: patrick doerrie

customer_reviews.title: Great toddler car seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat! Baby #2 got the car seat that was much cheaper than her older sibling and it does the job just as well! It’s very lightweight and we took it with us on the airplane ride across the country and it was great. It’s narrow enough to fit perfectly in the plane seat.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great in terms of weight
customer_reviews.text: Great in terms of weight, portability, and price. Installation and cleaning aren't simple or streamlined and not especially well padded. Works well enough as a portable seat that we take on airplanes and use in rental cars on the other side. Barely fits installed on an airplane rear-facing and makes it impossible for person sitting in front of the seat to recline. Reasonable amount of room if it's installed forward-facing.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent car seat for a great price . I put it in the center seat for my 6 month old who is 20+ lbs . Of course he is rear facing but the seat fits nicely in my full size car . He doesn’t seem to mind it either . Installation kinda ticked me off at first but after figuring it out it wasn’t too bad . One thing is to get the seat perfectly level I had to roll a towel tightly and stick it in the front of the seat so my child is sitting properly .
customer_reviews.author: Elisabeth

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, Lightweight and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: This car seat may not look as good as other more expensive ones but it totally is! Our 2 year old sits very comfortably in it, unlike the ones with a bunch of padding that just takes up space. It’s also super easy to install and switch from car to car, takes us less than 5 minutes. When buckled using a seatbelt it feels really sturdy, probably stays in place even if we flip over (make sure to pull the belt all the way to lock it and then release). We’ve had it for a year and I’m glad we purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cut into babys legs and didnt work rear facing.
customer_reviews.text: There were a couple of issues with the carseat. First the harness around the legs is in a very strange position. My daughter doesnt even have chunky legs, she is quite skinny, but the belt still cuts into her legs. Second, it didnt work at all rear facing in my car (mazda protege). she looked all curled up and dreadfully uncomfortable. Thus we are returning the item. Im sure it would work better forward facing but there were too many things that we didnt like. You get what you pay for!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: Nice carseat
customer_reviews.text: I needed a car seat for a second car and stumbled across this one. My daughter is 3.5 y/o now and won't be using these types of seats that much longer so I opted for a cheaper, semi-temporary one this time around. I just wanted something clean, trustworthy and comfortable. Installation was a breeze. My daughter has on more than one occasion said that she loves her new car seat, so she's happy and so am I.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: Good travel seat, not comfy enough for full time seat
customer_reviews.text: This is fine for what I bought it as: A travel car seat. We have a Maxi Cosi Pria 70 which is heavier and more expensive and harder to get in and out of the car. It also seems a lot sturdier/safer and more comfortable. You do get what you pay for. However, when flying on airplanes, we didn't want our nice car seat getting beat up. This fit the bill. At just under $50, we're not worried about it and it buckles in and out of cabs and airport rides with relative ease. It would not be my preference for a full time car seat if you can afford something nicer. It just isn't as comfortable and soft.
customer_reviews.author: MissMare

customer_reviews.title: Solid car seat
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a back up seat so we wouldn’t have to switch out car seats constantly. Gets the job done. I wouldn’t use this on long car trips since the seat padding isn’t as nice as our other but for trips to the store and day care it’s perfect. I also find the shoulder straps to be a little difficult to get on but with a wiggle worm what can you expect. It’s a great price and I feel like it’s a great deal for what you get.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica A Peters

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR UNDER 2!!
customer_reviews.text: It says 20lbs on the website but once I got it the package said 2 years. It’s only front facing! Basically no point in getting this because I had to buy another one for my daughter for the next year and all of the ones you buy for year one work all the way up.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Evans

customer_reviews.title: It is what it is
customer_reviews.text: VERY simple product. We used it for a visiting little family member so it wasn’t in use too long. However it is very basic, hardly any comfort was added. All car seats are required to pass the safety standards but it definitely is not plush and padded. I’d probably only buy it for travel and short term use with an older child. Very easy to clean though.
customer_reviews.author: Swiggle

customer_reviews.title: Great carseats
customer_reviews.text: We have twin one year olds, a 3 year old, and two older kids in boosters. These carseats are safe, comfortable, and slim enough that they fit into our minivan along with three other carseats. I highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebekah

customer_reviews.title: Look No Further!
customer_reviews.text: Look no further! This baby car seat is perfect for 12-24 months old! It’s perfect for my grandson! Provides great leg room, has multiple strap slot adjustments for growth. It’s padded for extra comfort. Can be turned frontwards after baby reaches a certain weight and age. He’s still facing the seat.
customer_reviews.author: Thumbs-Up!!

customer_reviews.title: Overall very happy, but installation had me swearing.
customer_reviews.text: I knocked this down a star because even though I love it overall, installation was a pain. I gave up and had my husband do it. He had to use our car's owner's manual to get it set up right. Other than that I think it's an excellent car seat for the money. P.S. I use it for when I need to take my grandson with me.
customer_reviews.author: Anne M. Galivan

customer_reviews.title: Very safe and affordable; hard to install
customer_reviews.text: In all our vehicles, this car seat requires a rolled blanket under the feet for the rear facing installation. Tightening the latch anchors was pretty hard compared to our infant bucket seat. This is an alternate car seat in my MIL's car so for that purpose it is sufficient. I dread transferring it between cars. Maybe front facing will be easier, once baby is a bit older.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Equal Safety for less $
customer_reviews.text: It's a basic, but really safe carseat that still looks chic. We got this for our small car and have the Evenflo Triumph for our other car. I obsessed over buying carseats, but I'm also on a tight budget so $300 carseats were over my price range. I felt both Evenflo models provided the peace of mind through their safety tests, and the style made me happy as well. Our son is two now and forward facing, he is safe and comfortable in the back of our Corolla in this. You can't beat the price and if you have to change carseats often or travel, consider this carseat. It's pretty light while still being just as safe as $300 carseats.
customer_reviews.author: alana

customer_reviews.title: Great for price but buy shoulder straps!
customer_reviews.text: For the price it’s a great product. Biggest complaint is how the shoulder straps cut into my toddler’s neck but you can buy shoulder pads I’m sure to help with that. Overall it’s kightweight and perfect for traveling which is what we wanted it for as our convertible car seat (Graco All in One forever...) is too bulky to be lugging around. We bought it along with a strap and used it to carry the diaper bag and such until we got to the door and checked it there.
customer_reviews.author: Luly

customer_reviews.title: Love this car seat
customer_reviews.text: This car seat is so awesome not counting how the looks of it is awesome too. had a nice cup holder on the side , I love it cause its light weight and not bulky light most and weigh a ton , the price is perfect for this seat and I have had it now for several months and no issues at all , love it
customer_reviews.author: Sherry

customer_reviews.title: Not good for deeper seats in car
customer_reviews.text: This car seat was difficult to install properly. Since my car had deeper bucket seats in the back, it was really hard for this car seat to stay secure. It would easily move up and down even after securing it. I had to send it back. Saving some money was not worth putting my child at risk.
customer_reviews.author: H. Tran

customer_reviews.title: Not a secure install
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved it because it was so light. Then I went to install it rear facing.... it will not secure into the car. It only uses the seatbelt through it and is so wobbly and has ALOT of wiggle room.I fear this would do NOTHING in an accident. Very lose once istalled.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: Life saver... No pun intended
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my little boy to replace his bulky and hard to use seat. Extremely easy to install and has all the safety features of the 200 dollar seats. On top of that it's very light making it easy to move from vehicle to vehicle. I highly recommend this car seat to anyone who is in the market for one.
customer_reviews.author: D Moore

customer_reviews.title: The latch is pretty easy for me to put on and take off
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's lightweight. The latch is pretty easy for me to put on and take off. It is easy to install. Cons: It does not stay flat when the seatbelt is pulled tight for the install. I even opted for a video chat with their rep and it did not help. She was also unbelievably rude, but that's a different story. We only use it for travel and not for our day to day carseat.
customer_reviews.author: Liz Lemon

customer_reviews.title: Overall great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My daughter seems to be comfortable in the seat (14 months, rear-facing). Easy to use and install. Very light. Overall, we're impressed for the price. Cons: The cup holder seems impossible to attach because where its supposed to go, the fabric flap is over it. Maybe we're not doing something right... We have the seat rear facing in the back of a crew cab truck. We have the little kick stand the right way but its still not at the correct angle which would need some towels/blankets to prop it up properly. The release button to loosen the straps is a little bit of an awkward angle but that wont be an issue once we flip the seat forward facing.
customer_reviews.author: sje375

customer_reviews.title: Protection for those who are important to you.
customer_reviews.text: We bought two of these, to handle our most precious "cargo". The seats are comfortable, which makes one less headache in getting them safely strapped in. The straps in the seat hold the child securely, and the straps on the seat hold the seat securely. BOTH are important.
customer_reviews.author: tomtees

customer_reviews.title: Too heavy
customer_reviews.text: Awkward and heavy. I don’t drive so I have to take this in a Lyft to get my son to the pediatrician and carry it around while we are at the office. I have to have another adult with me because it’s not possible to carry both my child and the seat. OTHERWISE it is a great seat. I feel safe with my son in it.
customer_reviews.author: Andi Munzer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a rarely-used backup seat
customer_reviews.text: This thing isn't too shabby. One reviewer called it garbage and uncomfortable. Well, it's not garbage, but it's not a $300 seat, so of course it's not going to be a Cadillac. It works fine and my picky little girl has no problem being comfortable in it. Definitely worth the money as a backup option.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome carseat for Grandma
customer_reviews.text: I needed my own carseat to pick up my grandson, I didnt want all the complicated ones as those were the ones getting the great reviews, not to mention costing a fortune. I came across this one in an article and I love it. It's easy to use and my grandson loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Temeka Wood

customer_reviews.title: Very Satisfied With The Price & The Car Seat & The Great Customer Support.
customer_reviews.text: Great Price & perfect for my occasional use when taking care of my three year old grandson. I had to call the manufacturer for minor installation help & the customer service person was very polite & instantly knew how to help me -- less than a minute telephone call. I have no experience installing car seats so my issue was because of my inexperience --- the installation & removal is very easy. My grandson fit perfect in the car seat. He likes the cup holder.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Ok for travel - wouldn't recommend for everyday use
customer_reviews.text: We bought this as a travel car seat for its lighter weight profile vs. our main car seats. Based on our first trip we have found the anchor hooks (rear facing) are almost impossible to use and the strap is very difficult to tighten. We used the shoulder belt to harness the seat. Also, even with the suggested towel under the seat (which is ridiculous that you would need to bring a towel as opposed to the seat having a built-in adjustment) we found it difficult to get exactly level. This all said, it is light and works for travel but definitely would not recommend using for everyday if one can afford another option.
customer_reviews.author: geegee11

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.text: This seat is pretty cheap feeling and light weight. The cup holder seems like an afterthought. The headrest does not stay on even during short rides. The wide head area gives insufficient support and my child's had flops during naps in the car. Given the price it still deserves three stars for its safety rating. It would be good to travel with or as a secondary seat for the grandparents.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Overall decent car seat for the price Suggestions: the ...
customer_reviews.text: Overall decent car seat for the price Suggestions: the car seat comes as if it's for forward facing! This is not marked and no where in the manual does it say that you need to move the strap to the different position to anchor in the latch system so it took taking to the fire station to fix it. Also make sure you read your car manual to see where the seat is able to be latched as we could only latch in the side and not in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: ncsimplelife

customer_reviews.title: Bought for air travel and LOVE
customer_reviews.text: We bought this specifically for air travel because it is lightweight. Does not disappoint. We use in combination with a Go-Go-Babyz carseat dolly and it's perfect for carting through the airport without having to take a stroller. Also fits well in an airplane seat. We also use it in our second vehicle the rest of the time. Very user friendly.
customer_reviews.author: M. Hanus

customer_reviews.title: Great Seat
customer_reviews.text: Love this seat. It is narrow enough that we are able to place it in our Subaru Outback and still have room for 2 people to fit in the back as well. Also very well constructed and feel better than my SafetyFirst that we initially bought. This seat does take a bit to change the settings for when your little one gets bigger but I feel that the construction is much better than others I have seen.
customer_reviews.author: Seth Jaco

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price, but a little bit extra padding might make it better.
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I received two 🤷‍♀️ Thank you 😁. Suggestion for improvement. The cover is pretty thin, so my toddler is basically sitting on plastic. It takes forever to warm up if the car was out in the cold overnight. We have to leave the car on for 10minute and the plastic is still pretty cold. My toddler cries when we put her in in the winter. I think a little bit more padding or different fabric might be a great improvement.
customer_reviews.author: Stewart and Elizabeth Olney

customer_reviews.title: Great seat at a good price
customer_reviews.text: Needed a larger car seat for my rapidly growing grandson. I found this seat and it was a great price, so I jumped on it. It was just as discribed and arrived when it was suppose to. I think this one is perfect and will last until he finally upgrades to a booster chair. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and buckle
customer_reviews.text: I prefer this car seat over my Graco. This seat is much easier to install and easier to buckle. My daughter has no complaints with it, we have added neck covers and it is perfect. Again, my favorite feature is the easy of tightening this buckle. Cup holder could be better but I would recommend this seat. We have now purchased two!
customer_reviews.author: NB

customer_reviews.title: 2012 Manufacture Date!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this seat only for travel, and I was looking for one that was lightweight, narrow, and allowed for extended rear-facing. I'm so disappointed to see that the manufacture date was 2012. That should be clearly listed on the product description! Right off the bat, you've lost six years of life on the seat. I would not have chosen this seat if I had known.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra

customer_reviews.title: ... button you press to adjust the shoulder harness can easily catch and hurt your thumb
customer_reviews.text: It's is ok for the price but be aware the button you press to adjust the shoulder harness can easily catch and hurt your thumb, I already did that 3 times. Also when I had to re adjust the seat straps to make the straps longer we had a lot of trouble getting the strap released. The plastic cover over it actually popped off. I eventually got it open and adjusted and restrapped but it was NOT easy to unlatch. Like I said it will allow me to pick up the grandkids with my car for a reasonable price but you get what you pay for when it comes to convenience.
customer_reviews.author: Cross trek mama

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and cheap, with good safety rating.
customer_reviews.text: We got this because we travel a lot and we love it. It’s really light! Pros: -cheap -light weight -great safety rating -pretty standard installation - daughter seems to enjoy sitting in it - detachable cup holder is a nice bonus Cons: -needs a towel to get the seat leveled properly. -installation is standard, which means it takes a bit of time to do. Easy enough, but I know there are faster/easier designs out there. But for the price, you can’t beat it!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Mulvany

customer_reviews.title: great price
customer_reviews.text: I love this car seat. I really like the fact that you can take the cover off and throw it in the washer on a gentle cycle. We road trip and the fact that I can 'recline' this seat is great because my daughter tends to sleep most of the drive. for short trips she sits upright and enjoys the view from the window. the only reason I didn't give this chair five stars is because the straps that come with it are clunk/cumbersome. At first I wasn't quite sure what to do with them; I had to search you tube to figure it out. Overall, this is an excellent product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Shaharah

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, great for travel!
customer_reviews.text: Great seat. Light weight. I wish it came with shoulder pads though to protect the neck because the placement and design of the seat means the straps are narrow on the sides of the neck. Also, the bottom and back of this seat are quite sharp so it requires towels or a seat cover to protect the car upholstery or leather. Not a big deal though given the price and travel-ability of this seat.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: I've purchased at 8 carseats in recent years and this is by far my favorite!
customer_reviews.text: Great consumer ratings, lightweight and easy to transport from one vehicle to another. I purchased it because the seat my daughter has is heavy, bulky and a serious pain to get in and out of the vehicle. I had concerns about being able to sit two additional passengers in the back seat comfortably with a carseat, as I wasn't able to do so with my last couple. This seat allows for plenty of room and my granddaughter says it comfortable. I rate this carseat so high that I'm going to buy one for each of my sister's 2 babies. She hates the current ones she has due to their weight and bulky size.
customer_reviews.author: Stacie Heyborne

customer_reviews.title: Amazing car seat for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got two of these, one for each car as our 10 month old has outgrown his newborn car seat, it take me a rolled up towel underneath in both cars to make it level but other than that it was simple. Its a really great car seat for the price, glad I didn’t spend $250 plus on a car seat, this one is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin

customer_reviews.title: Ok for travel
customer_reviews.text: I got this car seat strictly to take with us when we travel and it is good for that purpose since it is cheaper and lighter then our usual car seat however it is not easy to install and I order to get it reckoned correctly we Had to put the front passenger seat all the way up so no one could sit up there.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Pratt

customer_reviews.title: Excellent travel car seat
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, does everything it needs to, and travels well to boot (no need for a roller bag to take this through the airport). Feels very secure with our 20 lb son in it, and he seems comfortable in it. I still like our Foonf for normal day-to-day use, but this is an excellent "second" seat or one for traveling with. And at Amazon's price, it's far less expensive than paying for one from the rental car agency!
customer_reviews.author: Kris B.

customer_reviews.title: Switched to this seat after my baby turned 1 year.
customer_reviews.text: Got a 12 months baby girl who grew to fit out of the old infant seat. after reviews and analysis brought this and installed it. I would say my daughter likes it facing front rather than back. additional cup helpful to hold water bottles. but easy to install and change... would have given 5 stars if it came with more options to change the inclination angles.
customer_reviews.author: Ashok Ramkumar

customer_reviews.title: Very good for a second non expensive safe car seat
customer_reviews.text: I needed a second car seat for eventualities and I was looking for a non expensive safe one, and this is it! I mean, it wasn't super easy installing it but with a little extra help i was able to do it. Perfect for I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Lola

customer_reviews.title: Wish I could return it
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4 year old. Its to small for my little guy. For starters the straps are on the highest notch and it’s still isn’t tall enough to sit on the shoulders. Seems like it’s missing the next up notch especially for a XL convertible at seat. My son isn’t tall for his age or anything. The other issues is the side straps are over so far into the seat part that they dig into the side of his legs. I've never had a car seat that was a normal size but designed for what seems like tiny an short kids.
customer_reviews.author: Julie R

customer_reviews.title: Good back up or grand parent seat
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, this is the Geo Prism of car seats. Nothing wrong with it, but everything about feels like minimum spec. Substantially wider and with less padding than our Diono seats. Our kids, near the lower quartile for weight, have tons of extra room. I wouldn't use it every day, but for a travel set or grand parent seat, it works. Also does not come with any insert for infants out growing the bucket. Despite product claim of "assembled in the USA" it says on the side "made in China"
customer_reviews.author: eman

customer_reviews.title: Happy grandma and grandson
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so that I can take my little cutie grandson with me, without having to borrow a car seat. When I opened the box, I immediately liked the color of this seat. Seat feels heavy and substantial, but not too heavy. All the fasteners fasten and unfasten more easily than in other seats I've used. My daughter set this one up and put it in the car for me, and she said it's easier to get strapped into the car than the ones she has used before. My grandson seemed happy and comfortable riding in it, so everyone is happy. The price was exactly what I was looking for. Glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Red Teapot

customer_reviews.title: Good car seat
customer_reviews.text: It wasn’t the easiest car seat to install, I’d say it ranks average. Once installed and baby strapped in it’s held up just fine and seems safe. It’s doing it’s job and my 30lb almost 3 feet tall 1 year old seems content during even very long rides of an hour or more. For the price, it’s a great deal.
customer_reviews.author: Healgirl

customer_reviews.title: Great budget seat
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat that doesn’t cost an arm and a leg. It lacks some of the features of the more expensive ones but this went into our second car and the seat was only used a few times a month so it worked perfect for what I needed.
customer_reviews.author: CHarp

customer_reviews.title: Loved it so much, Bought a second one for other Duramax!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Hooks into the latch system and functions very easily. Having my 18 mo old sit in the middle of the back seat of my duamaxes, I needed a quality seat that i didn't have to fuss with to get it and him secured. I Loved this seat so much, I spluged and got a SECOND identical seat for the other Duramax. Worth every dime for what I'm using it for. The cup holder that does come with it is worthless, it has to be installed in such a way that the cover can't stay in place NOR can the kid reach anything in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy Myers

customer_reviews.title: Worked for us
customer_reviews.text: We were in a collision where we were struck from behind and launched into the car in front of us. The results were a concussion for both my husband and myself, an accordion shaped car, and a perfectly happy healthy safe child in the backseat. I replaced my car seat with the exact same make and model car seat.evenflo tribute LX convertible for the win.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My kid is small....
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't sure at first as it is a lower cost item compared to others on here. After reading the reviews I decided to purchase two, one for each vehicle. We are very pleased from the result. It took my kid a little bit to get used to it but eventually she enjoyed being upright as her old seat was a carrier version.
customer_reviews.author: Studental

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great car seat! It is a little tricky to install but not too bad. If you need to move this back and forth between cars... forget it. It's harder to do that! But we love this car seat and it serves us well!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan P

customer_reviews.title: 2 year old approved!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 2 year old for the forward facing position. He's about 30lbs and on the tall side. It fits him really well and feels like great quality. I like the higher sides near his head since he still likes the car naps. Gives his head a place to rest. It has multiple adjustments for both the shoulder straps and the crotch strap placement. Which makes it very customizable to your child's weight/height. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: IheartAmazon

customer_reviews.title: Great carseat for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic carseat for the price! My only complaint would be the release button for the harness. It’s not really a button and is a little difficult to press, if you have the seat rear-facing. Other than that, very pleased with this model!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron LaBarbera

customer_reviews.title: not comfortable
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this for my 6 month old grandson for our car. my big complaint is he needs to be facing backwards and when he falls asleep his head does not stay back it keeps falling forward very uncomfortable. there is not ebnough adjustment in the car seat platform to make it go back further so i have to warp up a towl and stuff it between the seat and the front of the car seat to make it lean back.i am driving a 2005 honda civic shouldn't be an issue.
customer_reviews.author: knox

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Really great car seat. Could never figure out the cup holder but feels secure when you buckle and a lot of room for our 19month old. We bought it for a trip because of the price and ended up making it his regular car seat.
customer_reviews.author: LW

customer_reviews.title: It worked ok but is definitely not good for a child less than 18 months old as ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this and had it shipped to our vacation destination so we had a car seat for the rental car. It worked ok but is definitely not good for a child less than 18 months old as it sits too upright for a rear facing car seat. Probably something you could mitigate with a towel on the seat but when you stick it in a rental car you've never been in, not too easy to do. I think it will be a good car seat once our daughter reaches 2 years old.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and fits on economy plane seats
customer_reviews.text: Great car seat for traveling. Have taken it on a couple of plane trips and it just fits on an economy seat facing forward. Easy to uncover the seat padding to loop seat belts through. It's also light enough to carry one handed. Goes into cars just like a regular car seat. Only issue I had was that a clip fell off where the seat padding clips into the body. It doesn't affect the functionality of it but I contacted Evenflo and they sent me a set of two clips. It's not the best quality but it serves its purpose.
customer_reviews.author: The Advocate

product_meta.title: Evenflo Tribute LX Convertible Car Seat, Saturn
product_meta.description: Color:Saturn| Style:Only Car SeatThe Evenflo Tribute LX Convertible Car Seat holds a rear-facing infant from 5 - 40 pounds (height: 19 - 37 inches) and a forward-facing toddler from 22 - 40 lbs. (height: 28 - 40 inches). The Evenflo Tribute LX Convertible Car Seat meets or exceeds all applicable Federal Safety Standards, as well as Evenflo' s Side Impact Test Standard for Structural Integrity, which uses energy levels approximately 2 times the Federal Crash Test Standard for multiple-shoulder harness positions. The 4 shoulder strap positions on the Evenflo Tribute LX Convertible Car Seat allow it to accommodate growing children longer, and the easy to access upfront harness adjustment and buckle release makes it convenient for simple harness adjusting. The energy absorbing foam liner used in the Evenflo Tribute LX Convertible Car Seat provides added safety at the same time providing extreme comfort for your infant or toddler. Harness covers, buckle covers and a plush head pillow will keep your infant or toddler comfortable during long car trips. Cleaning Instructions : DO NOT lubricate or immerse in water any part of this child restraint, unless rinsing is permitted Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. Take care not to damage any labels. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water, delicate cycle. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. Periodically inspect and clean the restraint's crotch buckle of food, liquids, and other debris to ensure proper latching. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate the buckle back and forth. Press the red button several times while the buckle is in the water. Do not submerge the harness strap. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant. Fit: The top of the child’s ears are at or below the top of child restraint seat back.
feature_bullets: Made in the USA and Imported

Designed and tested for structural integrity at energy levels approximately 2x the federal crash test standard. Rear facing fit tip is top of child head is at least 1 inch below the top of the child restraint seat back
Multiple shoulder harness positions for better fit and longer use. Age at least two years of age
Upfront harness adjustment and buckle release allows easy and convenient adjusting
Integrated body cushion gives added comfort to baby and an easily removable head pillow for older children
Side impact tested, meets or exceeds all applicable federal safety standards and Evenflo's side impact test standard

specifications.Care instructions: Plastic and metal parts may be wiped clean with mild soap and water and dried with a soft cloth. Do not use abrasive cleaners or solvents. The harness can be wiped clean with mild soap and water. Allow harness to air dry. Machine wash the seat pad separately in cold water. Tumble dry 10 to 15 minutes on low heat. Place the buckle in a cup of warm water and gently agitate. To avoid damage to the buckle, do not clean the buckle with soap or detergents and do not use a lubricant.
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars3,655 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Domestic Shipping: Item can be shipped within U.S.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
